summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GridWise energy management dashboard. Backend APIs are 100% functional, frontend UI/UX is excellent, but frontend-backend integration is blocked by external URL routing issues.

integration_issues.issue: Frontend cannot reach backend via external URL (https://work-1-rnyltbyvfgboejex.prod-runtime.all-hands.dev) - CORS policy blocking and 404 errors
integration_issues.impact: Historical data not loading - empty charts, no date options, AI insights stuck

passed_tests: Backend API health check (100% success rate)
All 7 backend endpoints working correctly with proper data
Frontend UI loading and navigation between all 4 views
Real-time data updates via WebSocket fallback simulation
Live indicator showing real-time values (Wind, Solar, Grid Frequency)
Navigation between Dashboard, Wind Power, Solar Power, Machine Consumption
Date selector UI component (though no data due to API issue)
AI Insights panel UI (though stuck on 'Analyzing...' due to API issue)
All chart components properly rendered (though empty due to API issue)
Responsive design and modern UI with Tailwind CSS

success_percentage.frontend_ui: 95% - Excellent UI/UX, minor unused import warning
success_percentage.integration: 30% - Real-time data works, historical data fails due to URL routing

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix external URL routing to backend. The frontend cannot reach backend APIs via https://work-1-rnyltbyvfgboejex.prod-runtime.all-hands.dev (returns 404). Either: 1) Configure Kubernetes ingress to properly route /api/* requests to backend:8001, or 2) Update frontend to use correct backend URL. Backend is fully functional on localhost:8001.
